typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	fileName as string ('58556')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> inputitemscontainer
Filter1 derive(DS_FILENAME = $fileName,
		DT_FILETIME = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(ID_SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
inputitemscontainer select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,'[^0-9a-zA-Z]','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(isNull(iifNull(iifNull(iifNull(ItemCode , Barcode, ProductNameArabic) , iifNull(DescriptionArabic , ProductNameEnglish, DescriptionEnglish), iifNull(UnitItemBarcode , NoOfUnitItems, UnitWeightsize)),
iifNull(iifNull(UnitUOM , PackageUOM, CostPrice) , iifNull(SellingPrice , BrandTradeMarkEnglish, BrandTradeMarkArabic), iifNull(MoCIProductGroup , CountryofOragenName, CountryofOragenISO3)),
iifNull(iifNull(HSCode , SupplierCR, SupplierName) , iifNull(CategoryLevel11 , CategoryLevel22, CategoryLevel33), iifNull(CategoryLevel44 , Width, Height)))) != true()) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ITEMCODE = ItemCode,
		BARCODE = Barcode,
		PRODUCTNAMEARABIC = ProductNameArabic,
		DESCRIPTIONARABIC = DescriptionArabic,
		PRODUCTNAMEENGLISH = ProductNameEnglish,
		DESCRIPTIONENGLISH = DescriptionEnglish,
		UNITITEMBARCODE = UnitItemBarcode,
		NOOFUNITITEMS = NoOfUnitItems,
		UNITWEIGHTSIZE = UnitWeightsize,
		UNITUOM = UnitUOM,
		PACKAGEUOM = PackageUOM,
		COSTPRICE = CostPrice,
		SELLINGPRICE = SellingPrice,
		BRANDTRADEMARKENGLISH = BrandTradeMarkEnglish,
		BRANDTRADEMARKARABIC = BrandTradeMarkArabic,
		MOCIPRODUCTGROUP = MoCIProductGroup,
		COUNTRYOFORAGENNAME = CountryofOragenName,
		COUNTRYOFORAGENISO = CountryofOragenISO3,
		HSCODE = HSCode,
		SUPPLIERCR = SupplierCR,
		SUPPLIERNAME = SupplierName,
		CATEGORYLEVEL11 = CategoryLevel11,
		CATEGORYLEVEL12 = CategoryLevel22,
		CATEGORYLEVEL13 = CategoryLevel33,
		CATEGORYLEVEL14 = CategoryLevel44,
		WIDTH = Width,
		HEIGHT = Height,
		DEPTH = Depth,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME
	)) ~> stgProducts
